item.title: Omar Ghader (Marc)
item.description: Contact me If you want to contact me, feel free to contact me on linkedin Lead Software Engineer with 8+ experience, I have a strong experience in: Monitoring solutions: define the monitoring strategy for apps and platforms. Software Engineer: Design and implement applications. DevOps: Each application should be deployed somewhere. I do that in the cloud always. Cloud : AWS, docker, kubernetes and micro-service architectures Smart home: DIY cheap and good solutions for home Currently working at Ubisoft as a Lead Software Engineer in the monitoring team.
